column1: Appendix table 26. Population size for persons age 12 or older, by demographic characteristics, 2014-2018
Data source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Crime Victimization Survey, 2014-2018.
Authors: Rachel E. Morgan, Ph.D., and Barbara A. Oudekerk, Ph.D., BJS Statisticians
Appendix table 26. Population size for persons age 12 or older, by demographic characteristics, 2014-2018
a/Excludes persons of Hispanic/Latino origin, (e.g., “white” refers to non-Hispanic whites and “black” refers to non-Hispanic blacks).
b/Includes Native Hawaiians and Other Pacific Islanders, American Indians and Alaska Natives, and persons of two or more races.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Crime Victimization Survey, 2014-2018.
